channel.description: Recent content in English on Cooking

item.title: Shepherd's Pie
item.description: ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 50 - 60 min üç≥ Cook time: 30 - 40 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 8 Ingredients 600 grams (g) of mealy/floury potatoes 2 onions 2 carrots 4 tablespoons (tbsp.) of oil 800 g of minced lamb 100 g of frozen peas 2 tbsp. of tomato paste/puree 300 milliliters (ml) beef stock 1 tbsp. of sweet or smoked paprika 30 g of butter 200 ml of milk 1 pinch of nutmeg Directions Peel potatoes, cut into cubes and boil in saltwater for 20 minutes.

item.title: Yorkshire Puddings
item.description: Basically the northern England equivalent of the french pancake ( a means to make use of extra flour when you didn’t have enough for bread ). They go well with Sunday Roasts. Puddings may be preserved in freezer for up to a month. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 5 min üç≥ Cook time: 20 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 2 Ingredients 140g flour 4 eggs 200ml milk sunflower oil Directions Preheat oven to 230¬∞C / gas mark 8.
